## For New Heuristics
If adding a new detection heuristic:
- [ ] Added detection logic in `analyzer.py`
- [ ] Added appropriate severity and evidence
- [ ] Tested against synthetic sample (triggers correctly)
- [ ] Tested against organic sample (doesn't false positive)
- [ ] Updated README.md documentation
- [ ] Updated CHANGELOG.md

- [ ] Added/updated tests
- [ ] All tests pass
